question: Doodhnath Singh, the well-known Hindi writer has passed away. He hailed from which state?
explanation: Doodhnath Singh (81), the well-known Hindi writer, critic and poet, has passed away in Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh on January 12, 2018. In 2014, the government of Uttar Pradesh honoured him with their Bharat Bharti Samman. He is known for his works like \"Sapaat Chehre Wala Aadmi\", \"Aakhri Kalaam\", \"Nishkaasan\", \"Bhai Ka Shok Geet\", \"Dharmakshetra-Kurukshetra\" and \"Surang se Lautate Huye\".
